name: Star Ocean: Till the End of Time HD
name_original: Star Ocean: Till the End of Time HD
description:
The defining title in the Star Ocean series, that reveals the greatest secret in the Star Ocean universe, is finally available for PlayStation®4!
Thanks to the latest in HD emulator technology, the content of the original game remains untouched in this HD conversion available exclusively via download.
Full HD up-rendering reduces jagged edges and enhances light and shadowing, allowing for a much clearer game display.
In addition, features unique to the PlayStation®4, such as trophies, sharing functionality and remote play are also fully supported.
*Movie cut scenes in the game are still shown at the original resolution.
Remote Play requires PS Vita system and sufficiently robust Wi-Fi connection.
1 player
9GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
